SELECT count(*) FROM address a JOIN region rPro ON a.province_id=rPro.id
JOIN region rCit ON a.city_id=rCit.id
JOIN region rCo on a.country_id=rCo.id
JOIN region rcot ON a.county_id=rcot.id
WHERE rPro.`name` REGEXP #{keyword} or rCit.`name` REGEXP #{keyword} or rcot.`name` REGEXP #{keyword} or rCo.`name` REGEXP #{keyword} or a.detailed REGEXP #{keyword}

select id,province_id provinceId,city_id cityId,county_id countyId,country_id countryId,detailed,buyers_id buyersId,consignee_name consigneeName, consignee_telephone consigneePhone from address where buyers_id=#{buyersId}

SELECT CONCAT(pro.`name`,city.`name`,county.`name`,country.`name`,a.detailed) address FROM address a JOIN region pro ON a.province_id=pro.id
JOIN region city ON a.city_id=city.id
JOIN region county on a.country_id=county.id
JOIN region country on a.country_id=country.id
WHERE a.id=#{id}
